name: racing-game-monorepo
description: Racing game monorepo with Hono server and Svelte client

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.dev: npm run build:core && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web-svelte" "npm run dev:track-designer-react"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:prepare && npm run deploy:copy && npm run deploy:install
scripts.deploy:copy: cp apps/server/dist/index.js ./deploy/index.js && cp package.json ./deploy/ && cp -r apps/web-svelte/dist/* ./deploy/web/dist/ && cp -r apps/track-designer-react/dist/* ./deploy/track-designer/dist/ && cp -r packages/core/dist/* ./deploy/packages/core/dist && echo 'NODE_ENV=production' > ./deploy/.env

author: Miles Edwards
